title: AI Instructions
description: Instructions for the AI to follow when generating code.

title: NEVER Generate reqt_ids
description: reqt_id files in the json must be generated by the ReqText application.

title: ALWAYS add graceful debugging to console
description: Instructions for graceful debugging in the console so that AI can easily view the code behaviour.

title: ALWAYS run scripts and/or test after Changes
description: Whenever possible run the scripts and/or test after making changes to the code and review the terminal output.

title: ReqText Terminal Editor Reqs
description: This section contains the requirements for the ReqText Terminal Editor.

title: ONLY use std.out in the editor
description: In the renderer console.log cannot be used, only std.out. There are newline characters already in the tree.

title: Navigation
description: Navigation in the editor is done using the arrow keys.
